name: Potion Master
description: Potion Master is a puzzle-RPG. You are a bumbling potion shop apprentice with a bad-tempered, alcoholic boss. Even though you know you shouldn't, you often cover for the blacked-out Potion Master. But one day, you spoil a potion, and start a war. Now you must use your potion-making skills to bring peace to the land, or get filthy-rich through war-profiteering. In the words of Potion Master Al himself, you'd be surprised at the influence one little potion shop can have.
